attributes.action: Stop the proposed works on Broad Lane, South Elmsall
attributes.additional_details:
Stop the proposed bridge works on Broad Lane, South Elmsall until Network Rail put in a temporary bridge for residents.

 Redirecting traffic from approx 100 houses down a single lane with no road marking, no illumination and no gritting plan and expecting the emergency services and refuse services to also use this as access when the road is not wide enough for two vehicles, with winter upon us is dangerous and is putting lives at risk unnecessarily to reduce cost to Network Rail
These works have not been properly investigated, the local residents have not been properly consulted and all aspects of the proposals are not satisfactory for all affected residents.
